articles.description: Rose Zhang makes a stunning late run to overhaul Madelene Sagstrom and win the Cognizant Founders Cup by two shots.
articles.title: Cognizant Founders Cup: Rose Zhang wins by two shots

articles.description: Arsenal show their ugly side to keep the title race in the balance with victory at Manchester United, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal stay in Premier League title race with Manchester United win

articles.description: World number one Novak Djokovic is out of the Italian Open after losing to Chile's Alejandro Tabilo in straight sets.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic out of Italian open after defeat by Alejandro Tabilo

articles.description: Mikel Arteta says "in football there are always possibilities" - but what chance do Arsenal have of winning the Premier League?
articles.title: Arteta says title still 'possible' - but what chance do Arsenal have?

articles.description: Watch live BBC One coverage, listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow text updates as Manchester United take on Tottenham in the Women's FA Cup final.
articles.title: Women's FA Cup Final 2024 LIVE: Watch Man Utd vs Spurs plus score, commentary & latest updates from Wembley

articles.description: The Indiana Pacers demolish the New York Knicks to tie their NBA play-off series at 2-2.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Indiana Pacers beat New York Knicks to level series

articles.description: Pakistan bounce back from Friday's shock defeat by Ireland by easing to a seven-wicket win in the second T20 at Clontarf on Sunday.
articles.title: Pakistan beat Ireland to level T20 series in Dublin

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bochum vs Bayer Leverkusen in the Bundesliga
articles.title: Bochum vs Bayer Leverkusen: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.title: Bayern München vs Wolfsburg: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Telling James Anderson it is time to step aside shows a ruthlessness from Brendon McCullum and Ben Stokes that should end suggestions of a cosy England dressing room, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: James Anderson retires: Brendon McCullum & Ben Stokes show ruthlessness as England build for Ashes
